name: Winc, Inc.
description: Winc, Inc. is a modern wine company that focuses on direct-to-consumer sales through a personalized approach to wine selection and distribution. Founded in 2012, Winc aims to revolutionize the wine industry by creating a unique and engaging experience for wine lovers. The company provides a subscription service that curates selections based on individual tastes and preferences, allowing consumers to discover new wines effortlessly. Winc partners with winemakers and vineyards to source high-quality wines and offers an extensive selection that caters to various palates, from sweet to dry and everything in between. By leveraging data analytics and customer feedback, Winc continuously refines its offerings and enhances the overall customer experience. The company not only sells wine but also educates its customers through engaging content, wine pairings, and tasting notes, fostering a deeper appreciation for wine. With a focus on sustainability, Winc is committed to environmentally friendly practices in sourcing and packaging its products. This innovative approach positions Winc as a key player in the evolving landscape of the beverage industry, appealing to both casual drinkers and connoisseurs alike.
ceo: Winc does not publicly disclose the name of its CEO.

key_executives.name: Winc does not publicly disclose the names of its executives.

seo.meta_title: Winc, Inc. | Personalized Wine Subscription Service
seo.meta_description: Explore Winc, Inc., a modern wine company offering personalized wine selections delivered to your door. Discover your new favorite wines today!

faq.question: What is Winc known for?
faq.answer: Winc is known for its personalized wine subscription service that curates selections based on individual preferences.

faq.question: How does Winc work?
faq.answer: Customers take a quiz to determine their wine preferences, and Winc curates a selection of wines tailored to their tastes.

faq.question: Where is Winc headquartered?
faq.answer: Winc is headquartered in Los Angeles, California, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Winc offer?
faq.answer: Winc offers a variety of wines including red, white, sparkling, and rosé, as well as wine accessories.
